thread.title: Foxtender Announces Kickstarter Offering the World's First Automatic Bar Station - CBS
thread.title_full: Foxtender Announces Kickstarter Offering the World's First Automatic Bar Station - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Foxtender Announces Kickstarter Offering the World's First Automatic Bar Station - CBS
text:
Foxtender
Foxtender is trying to eliminate the concept of waiting in line for a drink and provide convenience for business owners and customers alike.
SAN DIEGO , Aug. 17, Not many people enjoy waiting in line for a drink in a popular bar, where getting the attention of a bartender can be close to impossible. The same problem applies to smoothie and juice bars when they are hit with their rush for lunch and dinner â€“ two times the people certainly need quick service the most. Fortunately, there's a new solution presenting itself, Foxtender Barmachine. Foxtender is the first automatic bartender that produces cocktails in a safe and secure prepaid system. Clearly, a breakthrough for bars, clubs and beyond, the company recently announced the launch of their crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter to bring the first run of Foxtenders to the public.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150817/258850
"Skip lines, drink smart," commented a spokesperson from the company. "Foxtender is perfect for any kind of event or location, serving anything from soft drinks to alcoholic cocktails. We just need your help to kickstart this project, it will change the way you think of getting a drink at a bar."
According to the company, the Foxtender Barmachine looks great and works blazingly fast; it includes a refrigerator, an easy pay interface, a cup dispenser for the drinks to be poured into, and an ID system to help make sure underage drinkers aren't served alcoholic beverages. The device can supply up to 400 drinks without human assistance, all made accurately and with amazing taste profiles.
Foxtender even features a mobile app, making payment easy right from a smartphone. The app is complete with a geolocation option, allowing users to quickly find out where the Foxtenders are in the neighborhood so they can enjoy a night or day out without having the hassle of lines and long waits.
Foxtender makes a great complement to any club, casino, hotel, or fitness club. It can even be used at events, including festivals, weddings and corporate events. For businesses who are concerned about costs, Foxtender pays for itself in one week of normal usage. Businesses have special access to the management dashboard of Foxtender, which allows them to get a free drink, set content of tanks, and decide percentages and prices for each cocktail.
The Kickstarter campaign has set a goal of $260,000 and ends on September 26, 2015 .
For more information be sure to visit our website or follow us on our social media:
